page.title: 16Road Count
page.content: The main road through Alsager is the B5077. The principle bus services on this road are run by Potteries Motor Company (P.M.T.). Service 75 and 75a cover Newcastle-Under-Lyme/Alsager /Radway Green. Alsager is situated, 6 miles from Congleton, 7 miles from Crewe, 11 miles from Stoke-on-Trent, 156 miles from London and 31 miles from Chester. There is a motoway via Audley Road. Traffic is Heavist on the B5077 between the hours of 8am & 9am and 4:30pm & 5:30pm. Traffic census carried out in June 1985 recorded the following vehicles using the road between 10:15am & 10:25am. Bicycles 3, buses 1, cars 79 , vans 19 lorries 5. 4:20pm & 4:30pm. Bicycles 53, buses 7, cars 300, vans 31, lorries 3. The increase in road usage is in the late afternoon it is mainly due to workers home from Radway Green.
